unnormalised: Hey there! Planning a Diwali bash or maybe a big fat Indian wedding? Well, mark your calendars 'cause things are about to get busy! The auspicious dates for Diwali puja are falling on 01/11/2024, so you've got plenty of time to prep… or do you? Remember, booking pandits, caterers, and decorators gets crazy close to the date. Start looking now!
normalised: Hey there! Planning a Diwali bash or maybe a big fat Indian wedding? Well, mark your calendars because things are about to get busy! The auspicious dates for Diwali puja are falling on first november two thousand and twenty four, so you've got plenty of time to prep… or do you? Remember, booking pandits, caterers, and decorators gets crazy close to the date. Start looking now!

unnormalised: And for all you lovebirds prepping for the shaadi season, consider this: most muhurats are between Nov '24 and Feb '25. Plus, lots of folks prepone their functions to avoid clashing with IPL season 2025. Don’t wait until 1 month before to secure your venue; you'll be left fighting over the last banquet hall in Delhi!
normalised: And for all you lovebirds prepping for the shaadi season, consider this: most muhurats are between November two thousand and twenty four and February two thousand and twenty five. Plus, lots of folks prepone their functions to avoid clashing with I-P-L season two thousand and twenty five. Don’t wait until one month before to secure your venue; you'll be left fighting over the last banquet hall in Delhi!

unnormalised: For those thinking of a New Year's Eve party, remember 31/12 falls on a Tuesday this year, so people might start the celebrations a little early on the 30th. Factor that into your planning if you’re hosting! And bookings for that usually kick off around October, so get cracking!
normalised: For those thinking of a New Year's Eve party, remember thirty first December falls on a Tuesday this year, so people might start the celebrations a little early on the thirtieth. Factor that into your planning if you’re hosting! And bookings for that usually kick off around October, so get cracking!

unnormalised: Lastly, don’t forget smaller events like birthdays! If your kiddo’s b'day is around Christmas time (25/12), book the entertainer and venue way in advance; everyone’s competing for the same dates. Happy planning, y'all!
normalised: Lastly, don’t forget smaller events like birthdays! If your kiddo’s birthday is around Christmas time (twenty fifth December), book the entertainer and venue way in advance; everyone’s competing for the same dates. Happy planning, y'all!
